Episodes.Title: Edge
Episodes.Plot: Eve is a killer. A killer makes no mistakes and has no conscience or they loose the edge. So what the hell happened? Maybe this means it's time to quit - if she can survive.

Episodes.Title: Memories
Episodes.Plot: Dr. Rankin is good doctor. He keeps his mouth shut. Too bad he's a junkie. Hopefully, he can stop the shakes long enough to save Eve.

Episodes.Title: Workday
Episodes.Plot: The job is simple. Eve's employers don't like complications. As an assassin you are only one phone call away from forced retirement.

Episodes.Title: Made Man
Episodes.Plot: Arthur Max is a made man. He's untouchable. What the hell is Eve doing paying him a visit?

Episodes.Title: Clean Up
Episodes.Plot: Eve's tied up with a gun to her head. Basically screwed. All she needed is 1 more second. Can she escape?

Episodes.Title: The Family
Episodes.Plot: Somebody's got to help you out sometime. How can you accept help when you don't know who to trust. There are lines even assassins can't cross.

Episodes.Title: Old Man
Episodes.Plot: Pull the trigger and Eve is free from the nightmares. Can killing right now make up for the killing you've done in the past?

Episodes.Title: Inocentes
Episodes.Plot: Every action has a reaction. When you?re an assassin though the reaction usually hits the ones you love.

Episodes.Title: The Hunt
Episodes.Plot: Is this justice or revenge? Eve's wades through blood to end what she started. The person between her and the finish line isn't who she expected though.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual material, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Absolution
Episodes.Plot: Eve must fight or die. Can Eve finish off the Downes family or will her quest for vengeance end in failure?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual material, drug use & offensive language
